briefTitle: A Two Comparator, Controlled Phase 3 Study in Patients With and Without Evaporative Dry Eye

outcomeMeasures.title: Subjective Ocular Comfort
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured using visual analogue scales (0-100); 0 indicates no/less symptoms and 100 indicates maximum/worse symptoms.

commonTop: Burning and Stinging in the eye
